AlarmHelp:
To receive Raid Alarm notifications, you need the official Rust+ companion app on your mobile device and pair it this server. To do this, press Esc and click "Rust+" in main menu.

Use /raidalarm test to test your alarm. To do disable, use /raidalarm disable
AlarmTestSent: Test notification sent. If you don't receive it, make sure you're paired with the server.
NoPermission: You don't have the permission to use this command.
